Banwari Lal Bairwa (19 January 1933 â€“ 22 July 2009) was an Indian politician and former Deputy Chief Minister of Rajasthan. He was a former Member of Parliament from Tonk (Lok Sabha constituency) in Rajasthan. He was a leader of Indian National Congress.
